Class w3c.amaya.HTTPLinkHeader 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.amaya.HTTPLinkHeader
public class HTTPLinkHeader
extends Object
A class to handle Link in HTTP headers. See HTML 4.0 specification, the HTTP 1.1 RFC 2068, section 19.6.2.4 Link. It provides a constructor parsing the whole list of attributes but currently only keep the link (href), rel, rev, title and anchor values.

anchor
href
next
rel
rev
title

HTTPLinkHeader()
HTTPLinkHeader(String)
Construct a new set of HTTPLinkHeader objects and initialize them by parsing the HTTP value for the Link header fields.

Handle an HTTPLinkHeader in Amaya Currently we just load stylesheets.
